name: Liquirosso 2 in 1 Soft Matte Liquid Lipstick & Blush
about: What it is:An easy-to-wear, buildable, soft-matte liquid lipstick and liquid blush in one..Formulation Type:Liquid Lipstick.Benefits:Hydrating.Highlighted Ingredients:- Peony Extract:Up to 12 hour comfort..What Else You Need to Know:This runway-inspired, liquid-matte color for lips and cheeks is layerable for natural makeup or intense color impact. Its lightweight formula has pigments designed for better affinity with lips, delivering buildable lipstick color. When applied to cheeks, this liquid blush gives subtle color and glow.
ingredients: -Peony Extract.-Amino Acids.-Roma-Light Complex..Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Ci 45410/Red 28 Lake, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Ci 15985/Yellow 6 Lake, Trimethyl Pentaphenyl Trisiloxane, Ci 15850/Red 7, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Propylene Carbonate, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Citronellol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Geraniol, Magnesium Silicate, Benzyl Alcohol, Tin Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply on your lips and cheeks, and gently blend outward with fingertips to blur color. .-For full intensity, fill in lips completely with applicator and build to meet desired color payoff..-Use the pointed applicator to line your lips and fill in with the flat side for desired coverage.

reviews.review_title: From Orange Alert to Peach Perfect! ud83cudf51
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh, where do I even start with this lipstick that I bought online home with the lowest of expectations? Picture this: I was browsing the Sephora website, my cart filled with the usual suspects, when I stumbled upon a lipstick that was, well, the brightest shade of u201ctraffic cone meets pumpkin spiceu201d orange that I have ever seen. I almost heard it dare me from the screen to give it a try, and well, who am I to back down from a challenge?  Expecting nothing less than to look like a walking safety hazard, I clicked u201cadd to cart,u201d half amused and half terrified. When it arrived, it got promoted from a dare to a double dare as I unwrapped it. But here comes the plot twist of the centuryu2026 As I swiped it on, it magically transformed from a scary tale orange to the most perfect, peachy, subtle kiss of sunrise! ud83cudf05  I canu2019t believe I am saying this, but I have fallen head over heels for this lipstick. Itu2019s like my lips but better, an effortless glide into natural but noticeable, a true Cinderella story in the makeup world. It seems to say, u201cWhy try so hard, darling, when you can look fabulous with just a hint of peach perfection?u201d  Now, I walk around with this lippy tucked safely in my purse, a constant companion ready to grace my lips with that perfect natural hue at a momentu2019s notice. Itu2019s the lipstick that taught me appearances can be deceiving, and sometimes, taking a little risk can yield a peachy keen reward!  If youu2019re on the fence about this one, just remember my tale of unexpected lipstick love. Trust me, give this bold but surprisingly subdued warrior

reviews.review_title: Natural But Glam Look for Every Occasion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on the Valentino Liquirosso 2 in 1 Soft Matte Liquid Lipstick & Blush, and I have to spill the tea on this amazing product. As a college student, finding multi-functional gems like this gets me all excited.   First things first, can we talk about the packaging? It's chic and minimal, just like how I want my Instagram feed to look! The classy applicator and outside design makes it a great addition to my vanity. Plus, it's a 2-in-1 deal, which means I get both my lip color and blush in one handy tube u2013 perfect for when I'm running late for class.  Now, let's get to the nitty-gritty. The texture is divine! It's creamy and lightweight, and it glides on my lips and cheeks like a dream. No tugging or weird patchiness here! The soft matte finish is everything I could ask for, and it doesn't leave my lips feeling all crusty u2013 no one wants that, right?  The shade range is on point! I went for After Club - neutral peach nude, and it's my new go-to hue. It suits my medium skin tone so well, and I'm living for it! Plus, the collection has a bunch of other shades which I really want to try so there's something for everyone.  Now, let's talk about something that is super important to me. This thing lasts! I've worn it through plane rides, coffee breaks, and even a late-night pizza run, and it held up like a champ. It's like having a beauty shield that keeps my lips and cheeks looking fabulous all day long.  Comfort-wise, this stuff is gold. I've had bad experiences with some lip products feeling like a desert on my lips, but not this one. It's comfy and doesn't make me feel like I've caked on a ton of makeup. Plus, it didn't irritate my sensitive skin when I used it as a blush, which is always a win. The matte look lasts all day and it keeps me looking fresh  And can we talk about how versatile this thing is? It's the ultimate makeup hack for a busy person! I won't lie; it's not the cheapest product out there. But honestly, considering I'm getting.
